comment._content: I like all those awnings. Google street view - maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&...

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
This photo is another in the series showing banners for the Grand Commonwealth Fair of 
Nov / Dec 1899.  The tramway infrastructure is there, but no sign of the trams which started in December 1899.

The other photos (so far) - 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2712341239/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3023707402/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3041763769/]
